title: Oregon Firm Recalls Smoked Bratwurst Product Due To Misbranding And Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, May 24, 2012 - Zenner's Quality Meat Products, Inc., a Portland, Ore. establishment, is recalling approximately 3,660 pounds of a bratwurst product because of misbranding and an undeclared allergen. The product contains soy protein, a known allergen, not declared on the label. The following...
impacted_products: 2.25-lb. packages containing "Zenner's Smoked Brotwurst" with a sell by date through 7/17/12
